item.description:
After our hike at World's End we will be meeting at the bar for Apps, Cocktails, Beer & Coffee.
We can order from the full menu at the bar, I just don't want to sit in the restaurant. It's more difficult to mingle in there and it will make it easier for our members if they only want an appetizer, salad or beverage.

Please check out the menu,

Please be courteous and update your RSVP if you can't make it. I will have to make reservations and I don't want to look like a clown 'cuz some people don't show up and don't let me know. Thanks in advance for that.

http://beerworks.net/home/index.html

Bon Appetit
item.how_to_find_us: Call me if you need to otherwise just look for the stocky 6 foot read head with the goatee... (OK I'm 5'10)

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Apps, Cocktails & Beer at Hingham Beer Works
